      • updateFixtures

        public void updateFixtures​(java.util.List<Fixture> updatedFixtures)
        For each updatedFixture the method matches an existing fixture and replaces the existing with new. The method does not persist the fixture or complete team data.
        Parameters:
        updatedFixtures -

      • getHomeTeamAdvantageByPosition

        public int getHomeTeamAdvantageByPosition​(Fixture fixture,
                                          int position)
        Method returns the difference between the strength of the opposing lines. Defence strength vs attack strength is considered for GKs, DEFs and ATT. All stats are considered for midfielders.
        Parameters:
        fixture - Fixture to be considered
        position - int specifying the position to be considered
        Returns:
        int home team advantage for the position
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - if position does not exist
